You review the model documentation provided by a model developer as part of the formal validation process.

## Prerequisites

- You hold the `Validator` role 
- A model developer has submitted model documentation for review 

## Key concepts

{{< include ../about/glossary/validation_reports/_review.qmd >}}

## Document Overview

1. [Log in to the ValidMind UI]({{< var vm_url >}}).

{{< include _review-model-documentation.qmd >}}

#### Unresolved conversations

Here on this documentation overview page, hover over the **{{< fa comment-dots >}} #** icon to see a preview of the unresolved conversation associated with the documentation section.

::: {.callout-tip appearance="minimal"}
Resolve conversations directly from this popup, or click to expand the conversation. [Learn more ...](collaborate-with-others.qmd#commenting)
:::

#### Model findings
Here on this documentation overview page, hover over over the **{{< fa triangle-exclamation >}} #** icon to see a preview of model findings associated with the documentation section.

::: {.callout-tip appearance="minimal"}
Click to expand the finding. [Learn more ...](work-with-model-findings.qmd)
:::

#### Recent activity

At the bottom of the Document Overview page, you will also see quick view of any documentation activity. 

::: {.callout-tip appearance="minimal"}
Click on **{{< fa eye >}} See all Activity** to be taken to the **[Model Activity](view-documentation-activity.qmd)** page.
:::
